prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan act on his desires towards me and communicate his feelings to me?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical listing of the chart data relevant to your horary inquiry—using strictly horary principles—for the question “Will Stefan act on his desires towards me and communicate his feelings to me?” Melissa (you) is represented by your Ascendant, and Stefan is indicated by the Ascendant’s 9th house (per our cross‐reference, his significator appears in your 12th house).

1. Melissa’s Ascendant Details and Immediate Indicators (Significator for You)
 a. Ascendant in Aries at 14°03′ (1st house)
  – Aspects to Ascendant include:
   • Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb 1°)
   • Sun Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°)
   • Jupiter Sextile Ascendant (orb 3°)
   • Mars Square Ascendant (orb 4°)
   • Chiron Conjunction Ascendant (orb 5°)
 b. The 1st-house energy is active with Uranus and Chiron present, emphasizing personal initiative and a feeling of urgency mixed with potential wounds or sensitivities.

2. Stefan’s Representative: The Ascendant’s 9th House (Mapped to Melissa’s 12th House)
 a. The 12th House begins at 24° Aquarius according to the provided house cusps.
 b. The 12th House contains:
  • Venus
  • Saturn
  • Neptune
  • North Node (retrograde)
 c. The clustering of these factors suggests Stefan’s influence is enmeshed in themes of secrecy, hidden motivations, and subconscious currents.

3. General Planetary Placements (For Context and Additional Influences)
 • Sun in Aquarius at 18°04′
 • Moon in Gemini at 4°45′
 • Mercury in Aquarius at 15°56′
 • Venus in Aries (located in the 12th house per the house display)
 • Mars in Cancer (retrograde) at 18°59′
 • Jupiter in Gemini at 11°17′
 • Saturn in Pisces at 18°02′
 • Uranus in Taurus at 23°16′
 • Neptune in Pisces at 28°08′
 • Pluto in Aquarius at 2°13′
 • North Node in Pisces at 29°33′ (retrograde)
 • Chiron in Aries at 19°40′
 • MC in Capricorn at 7°12′
 • IC in Cancer at 7°12′

4. Major Aspects Involving Key Planets and Points
 a. Between Ascendant/significator and other chart energies:
  – Mercury Sextile Ascendant (communication indicator)
  – Sun Sextile Ascendant (vitality and clarity in intentions)
  – Mars Square Ascendant (a tension that could indicate internal conflict or hesitation)
  – Chiron Conjunction Ascendant (pointing toward matters of vulnerability)
 b. Aspects among 12th House planets (Stefan’s significators) include:
  – Venus Conjunction North Node (orb 2°)
  – Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb 1°)
  – Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb 3°)
 c. Other noted aspects in the chart that modulate overall energy:
  – Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 1°)
  – Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb 4°)
  – Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 3°)
  – Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb 4°)
  – Moon Sextile Venus (orb 3°)
  – Moon Trine Pluto (orb 2°)
  – Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 3°)
  – Sun Sextile Chiron (orb 1°)

5. Notable Patterns and Configurations
 a. T-Square Formation #1:
  – Involving MC (7° Capricorn), Ascendant (14° Aries), and IC (7° Cancer)
  – This formation stresses issues involving personal identity (Ascendant) in relation to domestic/foundational matters (IC) and career or social standing (MC).
 b. T-Square Formation #2:
  – Involving MC (7° Capricorn), Venus (1° Aries in the 12th house), and IC (7° Cancer)
  – This indicates tension between public presentation and hidden or subconscious matters associated with relationships.

6. Additional Chart Qualities and Timing Influences
 a. The overall structure displays a Bowl formation with a dominant Air element among inner planets and a Cardinal mode emphasis.
 b. The top right quadrant is relatively empty, while most planets reside in the top left quadrant.
 c. The sextile aspect appears most frequently, providing supportive energy in communication and mutual understanding, yet squares (notably involving Mars) add an element of friction.

Each element noted above is crucial. The Ascendant and its aspects provide how you (Melissa) come into the query, and the cluster in the 12th House offers insight into Stefan’s energy, his potentially hidden perspective, and the likelihood of his acting or communicating. The interplay of supportive sextiles, tension from squares (especially Mars-related), and the deep conjunctions among Venus, Neptune, and the North Node will guide the interpretative process regarding action and communication.

Provide any further instructions before I move to a full synthesis of the interpretation based on this data.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The chart indicates that your Ascendant—symbolizing your presence and intent—is supported by clear communicative aspects (Mercury and Sun sextiles) that invite honest expression and openness. Though these energies suggest that you have a receptive awareness regarding the possibility of receiving Stefan’s messages, the tension indicated by Mars square your Ascendant points toward internal conflict and potential hesitation on your part in fully embracing or acknowledging the situation.

Stefan’s representation, found within your 12th house, shows his emotional motivations to be shrouded in secrecy and the Piscean influence of Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node. This configuration implies that while a deep, almost fated desire exists within him, external expressions of it may be delayed or filtered through layers of guarded reservation. Venus in Aries in this sensitive area adds a passionate, impulsive element but remains coupled with the inability to speak plainly, suggesting that any communication on his part is likely to be subtle, indirect, or even cryptic.

The overall pattern suggests that while there is an undercurrent of genuine attraction and a stirring of unexpressed desire, Stefan is inclined to handle his feelings with caution. Factors of duty, internal conflict, and the need to keep his emotions hidden for the time being appear significant. Stefan may eventually act on his desires and communicate his feelings, but likely under conditions that allow him some measure of emotional safeguard, resulting in ambiguous or nonconfrontational expressions rather than an explicit declaration.
